com.android.slyce

Class SlyceCameraFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.android.slyce.SlyceCameraFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.android.slyce.fragments.BaseDialogFragment.OnBaseDialogFragmentInteraction

    public class SlyceCameraFragment
extends Fragment
implements com.android.slyce.fragments.BaseDialogFragment.OnBaseDialogFragmentInteraction
    A simple Fragment subclass. Activities that contain this fragment must implement the OnSlyceCameraFragmentListener interface to handle interaction events. Use the newInstance(JSONObject, boolean, boolean) factory method to create an instance of this fragment. SlyceCameraFragment provides an integrated XML layout with all Slyce SDK functionalities.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static SlyceCameraFragment newInstance(JSONObject options,
                              boolean continuousRecognition,
                              boolean shouldPauseScanner)
        Use this factory method to create a new instance of this fragment using the provided parameters.
        Parameters:
        options - use this JSONObject to pass properties to Slyce servers. Can be null.
        continuousRecognition - boolean use this in order to stop the automatic scanner
        shouldPauseScanner - boolean use this to resume/pause the automatic scanner after detection
        Returns:
        A new instance of fragment SlyceCameraFragment.
